Jessica「ジェシカ Jeshika」 is a Top-Grade student at Rosewood Academy and one of Blade's first friends. Some time later, her true identity as a spy with the responsibility of monitoring all of Blade's movements would be revealed.



Advertisement
Appearance
Jessica, like Claire, has a lean figure and tanned skin with dark eyes and brown hair.[1] She was seen donning the academy's uniform, which consists of an ivory inner vest topped by a light pink coat draped over her shoulders with violet hems. A short, similarly pink skirt and dark velvet stockings, and a pair of black boots. Her main outfit is a white crop top that bears her curvy midriff, white short shorts, a left stocking on her left leg, a bandage on her right leg and sandals


Advertisement
Personality
Jessica is a beautiful young woman with a relaxed attitude. She does not mind being seen completely naked by Blade. She even lets Clay get a good look at her naked in the bath, finding his flustered reaction funny despite being oblivious to his feelings for her. She is usually seen hanging out with Claire or accompanying Blade, she is the happiest of the group and the funniest person Blade has ever met. However, under this facade hides her true compassionate and kind personality who always cares about his friends and loved ones.[1]

Plot
Sometime during Blade's stay at the Low-Grades, Jessica befriended him (though it could be another misunderstanding by the former).[2]

Asmodeus Arc
Several days later, Jessica and Claire are at the academy's cafeteria, where Blade invites them to sit with him and Arnest; however, they disregard his invitation and continue walking.[3]

Power and Abilities
Jessica is a top level fighter, her specialty being the use of her cutting wind fan, which combined with her stealth often places her as one of the best fighters in the academy.

She was the first student to manage to activate her heroic seal thanks to which she was able to match the power of Blade even if it was only for a short period of time.

Relationships
Blade
Jessica1
Jessica gets "serious" about Blade
Jessica is one of the few people who know Blade's true identity, while working for the organization she had a mission to monitor him and find out how much of his real strength he has left. After failing in her assassination attempts and seeing how far Blade is willing to go for her and her friends, Jessica falls in love with him. Taking leaps and bounds in their relationship to the point where she managed to get Blade to promise her to have a night together (although Blade isn't sure what that means).

Arnest
Due to the rapid progress of Jessica's relationship with Blade, Arnest often has her under surveillance, even more so after the two dates they had that ended up with Jessica and Blade in a love hotel. Despite all these they usually get along quite well.

On the other hand, Jessica really enjoys making Arnest jealous, usually calling her Blade's first wife and then throwing herself on Blade.

Claire
Claire is Jessica's best friend so they usually hang out together, they both know each other to the point of knowing the emotional state of the other with a simple look. With the passing of time, both would end up falling in love with Blade, something that Jessica finds wonderful but Claire doesn't like.

Lunaria
Jessica Bum
Jessica trying to seduce Blade
Lunaria and Jessica usually get along quite well, with Lunaria taking Jessica as an example in the art of seducing Blade.

Seruel
She is Jessica's older sister whom she admires a lot.

Clay
Jessica and Clay have been friends for a long time, unfortunately Clay has never been able to declare his feelings to Jessica and added to the fact that she only has her eyes on Blade, has made their potential relationship end up cooling off, even more so with the arrival of Blifire and Mother, who are always by Clay's side. Despite this, Clay holds Jessica in high esteem.

Kassim
Despite his behavior and often being beaten up by girls, Jessica considers Kassim a treasured friend.

Trivia
Jessica's measurements are 87-64-89
Jessica is the girl Blade has gone on the most dates with and the farthest he has gone, having visited and checked into a love hotel with her, at the end of each date.
Blade rejected Jessica's proposal to become lovers, this because Blade still doesn't know what it means or what he really feels for Jessica. Despite this, Blade and Jessica promised to "mate" in the future.
Due to Jessica's rapid advancement, the rest of the girls have sought ways to advance their own relationships with Blade, especially Arnest.
Unlike Arnest, Lunaria or Claire, Jessica often fantasizes about becoming Blade's lover, partly because of her character and partly because she enjoys making Arnest and Claire jealous.
